name: geology to raster
desc: The geology_to_raster module will create a raster file based on input geology.

properties.name: Account For Hierarchy
properties.desc: Account for Hierarchy is a toggle that forces hierarchy on multiple surfaces.  Use this IF the surfaces represent a geologic hierarchy.

properties.name: Reverse Hierarchy
properties.desc: The Reverse Hierarchy toggle determines whether the surfaces will define layers in a normal (top to bottom) manner or reversed (if on).

properties.name: Minimum Thickness
properties.desc: Minimum Thickness forces layers thinner than the specified value to have a minimum thickness and therefore not pinch-out completely.

properties.name: Output All Surfaces
properties.desc: Output All Surfaces is a toggle that determines if only the first surface is output or whether all should be included.

properties.name: Selected Format
properties.desc: The Selected Format allows the user to select the desired output type from a set list of options.
